Structs/SubscribeView.html#/s:11SwiftSa_.name: getStates()
Structs/SubscribeView.html#/s:11SwiftSa_.abstract: Set the state of subscribe, audio and video buttons,

Structs/SettingsView.html#/s:11SwiftSa_i.name: resetStates(useFile:)
Structs/SettingsView.html#/s:11SwiftSa_i.abstract: Reset the UI values using either file values or saved values.

Structs/PublishView.html#/s:11SwiftSa_iO.name: getStates()
Structs/PublishView.html#/s:11SwiftSa_iO.abstract: Set the states of capture, publish, audio and video buttons,

Classes/Utils.html#/s:11SwiftSa_iOS5Util.name: getValue(tag:key:defaultValue:)
Classes/Utils.html#/s:11SwiftSa_iOS5Util.abstract: Get a String value from UserDefaults, if available.

Classes/Utils.html#/s:11SwiftSa_iOS5Util.name: getValue(tag:key:defaultValue:)
Classes/Utils.html#/s:11SwiftSa_iOS5Util.abstract: Get an integer value from UserDefaults, if available.

Classes/MillicastSA.html#/s:11SwiftSa_iO.name: setCreds(from:save:)
Classes/MillicastSA.html#/s:11SwiftSa_iO.abstract: Read Millicast credentials from SettingsView and set them into App.

Classes/MillicastSA.html#/s:11SwiftSa_iO.name: getCameraName()
Classes/MillicastSA.html#/s:11SwiftSa_iO.abstract: Get the currently selected camera as a string, if any.

Classes/MillicastSA.html#/s:11SwiftSa_iO.name: getResolution()
Classes/MillicastSA.html#/s:11SwiftSa_iO.abstract: Get the currently selected resolution as a string, if any.

Classes/MillicastSA.html#/s:11SwiftSa_iO.name: getPubVideoView()
Classes/MillicastSA.html#/s:11SwiftSa_iO.abstract: Get the VideoView that renders the published video.

Classes/MillicastSA.html#/s:11SwiftSa_iO.name: refreshView()
Classes/MillicastSA.html#/s:11SwiftSa_iO.abstract: Render again the video of the currently captured video (if any).

Classes/MillicastSA.html#/s:11SwiftSa_iO.name: getSubVideoView()
Classes/MillicastSA.html#/s:11SwiftSa_iO.abstract: Get the VideoView that renders the subscribed video.

Classes/MillicastSA.html#/s:11SwiftSa_iO.name: toggleMedia(forPublisher:forAudio:)
Classes/MillicastSA.html#/s:11SwiftSa_iO.abstract: Toggle published/subscribed audio/video between unmuted and muted state.

Classes/MillicastManager.html#/s:11Swift.name: setCreds(using:save:)
Classes/MillicastManager.html#/s:11Swift.abstract: Read Millicast credentials and set into MillicastManager using CredentialSource.

Classes/MillicastManager.html#/s:11Swift.name: startAudioVideoCapture()
Classes/MillicastManager.html#/s:11Swift.abstract: Start capturing both audio and video (based on selected videoSource).

Classes/MillicastManager.html#/s:11Swift.name: getPubVideoView()
Classes/MillicastManager.html#/s:11Swift.abstract: Get the VideoView that renders the published video.

Classes/MillicastManager.html#/s:11Swift.name: refreshPubVideo()
Classes/MillicastManager.html#/s:11Swift.abstract: Render again the video of the currently captured video (if any).

Classes/MillicastManager.html#/s:11Swift.name: switchVideoSource()
Classes/MillicastManager.html#/s:11Swift.abstract: Stop capturing on current videoSource and switch to the next available videoSource on device and starts capturing.

Classes/MillicastManager.html#/s:11Swift.name: getSubVideoView()
Classes/MillicastManager.html#/s:11Swift.abstract: Get the VideoView that renders the subscribed video.

Classes/MillicastManager.html#/s:11Swift.name: toggleMediaState(forPublisher:forAudio:)
Classes/MillicastManager.html#/s:11Swift.abstract: Toggle published/subscribed audio/video between enabled and disabled (i.e. muted) state.

Classes/MillicastManager.html#/s:11Swift.name: pubConnect(useQ:)
Classes/MillicastManager.html#/s:11Swift.abstract: Publish audio and video tracks that are already captured.

Classes/MillicastManager.html#/s:11Swift.name: startPublish()
Classes/MillicastManager.html#/s:11Swift.abstract: Start publishing if video has been captured.

Classes/MillicastManager.html#/s:11Swift.name: getVideoSourceName()
Classes/MillicastManager.html#/s:11Swift.abstract: Get the currently selected videoSource (camera name) as a string, if any.

Classes/MillicastManager.html#/s:11Swift.name: getCapabilityName()
Classes/MillicastManager.html#/s:11Swift.abstract: Get the currently selected capability (camera resolution) as a string, if any.

Classes/MillicastManager.html#/s:11Swift.name: showAlert(_:useMain:)
Classes/MillicastManager.html#/s:11Swift.abstract: Show message as an alert on screen and print it on console as well.

Classes/MillicastManager.html#/s:11Swift.name: connectPublisher(pub:)
Classes/MillicastManager.html#/s:11Swift.abstract: Connect to Millicast for publishing. Publishing credentials required.

Classes/MillicastManager.html#/s:11Swift.name: connectSubscriber(sub:)
Classes/MillicastManager.html#/s:11Swift.abstract: Connect to Millicast for subscribing. Subscribing credentials required.

Classes/MillicastManager.html#/s:11Swift.name: getVideoSource(useMain:)
Classes/MillicastManager.html#/s:11Swift.abstract: If currently not capturing, create a videoSource based on videoSourceIndexSelected.

Classes/MillicastManager.html#/s:11Swift.name: startCaptureVideo()
Classes/MillicastManager.html#/s:11Swift.abstract: Using the selected videoSource and capability, capture video into a pubVideoTrack.

Classes/MillicastManager.html#/s:11Swift.name: startCaptureAudio()
Classes/MillicastManager.html#/s:11Swift.abstract: Using the selected audioSource, capture audio into a pubAudioTrack.

Classes/MillicastManager.html#/s:11Swift.name: stopCaptureVideo()
Classes/MillicastManager.html#/s:11Swift.abstract: Stop capturing video, if video is being captured.

Classes/MillicastManager.html#/s:11Swift.name: stopCaptureAudio()
Classes/MillicastManager.html#/s:11Swift.abstract: Stop capturing audio, if audio is being captured.

Classes/MillicastManager.html#/s:11Swift.name: enableTrack(track:enable:)
Classes/MillicastManager.html#/s:11Swift.abstract: If track exist, set enable value as given and return it as well.

Classes/MillicastManager.html#/s:11Swift.name: videoSourceIndexNext()
Classes/MillicastManager.html#/s:11Swift.abstract: Gets the index of the next available camera.

Classes/MillicastManager.html#/s:11Swift.name: capabilityIndexNext()
Classes/MillicastManager.html#/s:11Swift.abstract: Gets the index of the next available video capability.

Classes/MillicastManager.html#/s:11Swift.name: getPubListener(for:)
Classes/MillicastManager.html#/s:11Swift.abstract: Get a PubListener if one exists, and set it’s publisher to the provided one.

Classes/MillicastManager.html#/s:11Swift.name: getVideoSourceStr(_:long:)
Classes/MillicastManager.html#/s:11Swift.abstract: Get a String that describes a MCVideoSource.

Classes/SavedCreds.html.name: SavedCreds
Classes/SavedCreds.html.abstract: Serve as a source of Millicast Credentials.
